title: Rahti
overview: Rahti is a domestic drama series about international human smuggling and a group of people who have to deal with it. A young Eritrean woman loses her husband and her daughter while fleeing to Finland, a pair of brothers who have run into financial difficulties steal a van with people hidden inside, and a lawyer who has been waiting for adoption for years becomes the guardian of a child whose parents' whereabouts are unknown.Â
